name: sc-extract-sass-class-types
description: extras all sass class names as a TypeScript type definition

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc &&  node node_modules/.bin/sc-tsc --tsconfigFilePath ./tsconfig.json --addTslibJsInFolder . --outputFolder /Users/sebastiangurin/awa/bundles/18_2_sources/Modules/mine/Mine@1.0.0/ --debug && mv /Users/sebastiangurin/awa/bundles/18_2_sources/Modules/mine/Mine@1.0.0/src /Users/sebastiangurin/awa/bundles/18_2_sources/Modules/mine/Mine@1.0.0/JavaScript
